pull.title: rpc: Always throw in getblockstats if -txindex is required
pull.body:
Previously blocks with only the coinbase transaction didn't cause
the RPC error even if the requested stats required -txindex and
it wasn't enabled.

Fixes #14499.

events.message:
rpc: Always throw in getblockstats if -txindex is required

Previously blocks with only the coinbase transaction didn't cause
the RPC error even if the requested stats required -txindex and
it wasn't enabled.

events.body:
Tested ACK 3be209d103297aaf2fe4711e237a65046488ea1

I had also been confused by this behavior before, so this seems right.
